con:parameter.con:name: artist_id
con:parameter.con:description: Returns events filtered by applied artist id.

con:method.name: v2_5_artists_id_events
con:method.con:description:
This call returns events associated with artist.
** *Authorization required ** Fetch all events of an artist

con:parameter.con:name: city
con:parameter.con:description: Returns the associated events for city.

con:parameter.con:name: day_type
con:parameter.con:description: Returns the associated events for day type ( `weekday` / `weekend` )

con:parameter.con:name: end_date
con:parameter.con:description: Return all events having end date `less than or equal to` Start date. Expected format - `MMDDYYYY`. If end_date exists, start_date is mandatory field. Default value is `1 yr from start_date`.

con:parameter.con:name: group
con:parameter.con:description: Returns the associated events for promocode group

con:parameter.con:name: lat
con:parameter.con:description: Filter events by latitude

con:parameter.con:name: long
con:parameter.con:description: Filter events by longitude

con:parameter.con:name: min_price
con:parameter.con:description: Return all events having price `greater than equal to` min_price for requested purchase flow. If min_price exists, max_price is mandatory field.

con:parameter.con:name: max_price
con:parameter.con:description: Return all events having price `less than equal to max_price` for requested purchase flow. If max_price exists, min_price is mandatory field.

con:parameter.con:name: name
con:parameter.con:description: Return only events matching the specified full/partial event name (e.g. `PAW Patrol`).

con:parameter.con:name: promo_code
con:parameter.con:description: Returns events filtered by applied promo code.

con:parameter.con:name: page
con:parameter.con:description: The page for paginating through the results.. Default value is `1`.

con:parameter.con:name: promotion
con:parameter.con:description: Returns the events by promotion. Applicable values are `chase_eos`, `chase_preffered`

con:parameter.con:name: radius
con:parameter.con:description: Radius of the area in which we want to search for events. Default is `20`.

con:parameter.con:name: start_date
con:parameter.con:description: Return all events having start date `greater than or equal to` End date. Expected format - `MMDDYYYY`. If start_date exists, end_date is mandatory field. Default value is `todays date`.

con:parameter.con:name: sales_status
con:parameter.con:description: Returns the events which matches the events sales status (e.g. `onsale`,`offsale`,`comingsoon`).

con:parameter.con:name: sort_by
con:parameter.con:description: Returns event dates sorted by date ascendingly[sort_by=date] and descendingly[sort_by=-date].

con:parameter.con:name: size
con:parameter.con:description: Limit the result set to the specified number of resources. Default value is `20`.

con:parameter.con:name: sub_category
con:parameter.con:description: Returns the events which matches the classification's sub-category level (e.g. `Rock`).

con:parameter.con:name: status
con:parameter.con:description: Returns the events which matches the events status (e.g. `onsale`,`completed`,`cancelled`).

con:parameter.con:name: tag
con:parameter.con:description: Returns the associated events for tag

con:parameter.con:name: unit
con:parameter.con:description: Unit of the radius `['miles', 'km']`. Default is `miles`.

con:parameter.con:name: venue_id
con:parameter.con:description: Returns events filtered by applied venue id.

con:parameter.con:name: venue
con:parameter.con:description: Return only venues matching the specified full/partial venue name (e.g. `Chicago`).
